description: Vadim Black is confronted about his strange late-night activities by his neighbor Jordan Boss. When accused of selling drugs, Vadim decides to show Jordan what’s really going on behind closed doors. He’s in the business of pleasure and Jordan’s about to become his next client. Stripping off his clothes and hopping in the sling, Jordan lets Vadim take control of his cock and hole.
title: Every Town Secrets Part 1
